name: Girls Coloring Book
description:
** Girls Coloring Book is the best coloring app for kids. It will bring your kids to the colorful wonderland, where Princesses and Mermaids ... are waiting to tell their fairy tales.

** The Best princess coloring book For Daughter game! Color the coloring pages of princess, princes, fairy and pretty girls on your phone or tablet. In this princess game, girls can not only color the coloring pages, but also get random colorings to start from.
Just make full use of your fancy imagination and have fun!
Choose a color button then click the part of the picture you would like to make that color.

** With the amazing coloring pages and beautiful brushes, your little one is guaranteed hours of fun to free their endless imagination.The toolbar has brush,crayon,doodle paint,will show you how to draw and coloring step by step,like dress up a mermaid, Over 19 beautiful mermaid princesses like Snow White, Cinderella. ALL ARE FREE!
** If you or your daughter likes little mermaid or fairy tales story you will probably also enjoy coloring and painting the models in this app.
